mathEvaluator.title: Math Evaluator
mathEvaluator.description: Calculate complex mathematical expressions. You can use functions like sqrt, cos, sin, abs, etc.

etaCalculator.title: ETA Calculator
etaCalculator.description: Calculate estimated time of arrival or completion based on current progress and speed.
etaCalculator.example: With a concrete example, if you wash 5 plates in 3 minutes and you have 500 plates to wash, it will take you 5 hours to wash them all.
etaCalculator.consumptionRateLabel: Amount of unit consumed by time span

percentageCalculator.title: Percentage Calculator
percentageCalculator.description: Calculate percentages, percentage changes, and proportional relationships.
